name: Iambored
0:
”Alexa, I AM bored”
”Alexa, ask I AM bored, "give me ideas"”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i am bored
Developer Terms of Use
des: Ever wondered what you could have done than just twiddling those two thumbs, or watching another coat of drying paint? This skill inspires you on what to do. This Alexa skill is driven by a deeply artificial Artificial Intelligence which looks at time of day, and (coming soon) contextual information like weather, people like you, people who don't like you, and mind reading. Caution: it is deeply accurate. Written by an 8 year old, with some help from her dad.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
